title: Farmers Under Attack | Guests: Sen. Tom Cotton & Michael Knowles | 6/23/21
description:
Glenn explains what’s happening with our currency as the Federal Reserve plans to release "Digital U.S. Dollars." Senate Republicans shut down the For the People Act, and Sen. Tom Cotton joins to discuss what it would have done. Whistleblowers are opening up about critical race theory indoctrination in the military. Glenn explains the “Meat Mafia” and how we could soon have trouble feeding ourselves in this country. The Daily Wire’s Michael Knowles joins to discuss his new book, "Speechless." Parents across the nation are standing up against CRT to school boards, and Loudoun County, VA, is becoming a hot spot. Conservative Review podcast host Daniel Horowitz shares how he’s being censored on social media for talking about ivermectin and COVID-19.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
